applicant-name.name: ZHEJIANG JINGGONG NEW MATERIAL TECH CO LTD
浙江精功新材料技术有限公司

invention-title: Waste gas treatment process for carbon fiber pre-oxidation furnace and gas-collecting hood
一种用于碳纤维预氧化炉和集气罩废气处理工艺

abstract.p: The invention relates to the technical field of waste gas treatment of carbon fiber pre-oxidation furnaces and gas-collecting hoods, in particular to a waste gas treatment process for a carbon fiber pre-oxidation furnace and a gas-collecting hood, which comprises the following steps: 1, collecting waste gas of the gas-collecting hood, preheating and mixing, separating out tar, and recycling the waste gas of the gas-collecting hood; heating to a certain temperature through a heat exchanger, mixing with the waste gas of the oxidizing furnace, and feeding into a heat accumulating type incinerator; 2, after combustion, the waste gas enters a catalytic oxidation box to be subjected to catalytic oxidation, and hydrogen cyanide is further removed; thirdly, after heat exchange and waste heat recovery are conducted on the waste gas, the waste gas is fed into a cooling structure through a draught fan to be cooled, and the waste gas is cooled to a low temperature; 4, the cooled waste gas passes through a spray tower, the waste gas is subjected to alkali washing and sodium hypochlorite oxidation absorption, then the waste gas reaches the emission standard, and finally the waste gas is discharged, in the method, the waste gas is treated through the heat storage chamber incinerator and then subjected to three-stage treatment through the catalytic oxidation box and the spray system, and the waste gas reaches the national emission standard 1.9 mg/m < 3 > of hydrogen cyanide.

本发明涉及碳纤维预氧化炉和集气罩废气处理技术领域，尤其为一种用于碳纤维预氧化炉和集气罩废气处理工艺，包括以下步骤：步骤一：集气罩废气收集进行预热混合，析出焦油，经过换热器加热到一定温度与氧化炉废气混合进入到蓄热式焚烧炉中；步骤二：废气燃烧后进入到催化氧化箱，进行催化氧化，进一步去除氰化氢；步骤三：废气经过换热与余热回收后，通过风机送入冷却结构进行冷却降温，使得废气降到较低的温度；步骤四：降温后的废气通过喷淋塔，废气进行碱洗次氯酸钠氧化吸收后达到排放标准，最后排放，本发明中，废气经过蓄热室焚烧炉处理后又经过催化氧化箱和喷淋系统三级处理达到氰化氢国家排放标准1.9mg/m3。
